query: WITH entities AS (SELECT id FROM core_documents WHERE COALESCE(reference_id = $1, $1 IS NULL) AND (COALESCE(id < $3, true)) AND deleted = FALSE ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $4 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_document_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.id desc, i.id, e.sequence
